name: Dual-Stage Toxic Comment Detection System
description: A dual-stage ML system for detecting and categorizing toxic comments using classical and deep models, with bias mitigation and fairness-aware tuning. Achieves high accuracy (F1 = 0.92) on a 2M+ dataset, with open-source code and strong real-world applicability.

name: MediCareNet â€“ Predictive Healthcare Insights using ML & MLOps
description: MediCareNet is an end-to-end ML pipeline for predicting hospital readmissions from EHR data, using Truncated SVD and XGBoost, served via a real-time Flask API and fully containerized with Docker for scalable deployment.

name: Ask My Resume - Streamlit RAG Application
description: A mini project that lets you interact with your resume PDF using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) via LangChain.

name: VisionIQ
description: VisionIQ is a real-time object detection system built with fine-tuned transformer models, achieving 90%+ accuracy on live video feeds. It features a React dashboard for visual analytics, real-time inference via FastAPI using REST/WebSocket APIs.

name: SmartDocAI
description: SmartDoc AI is a serverless NLP system for intelligent document summarization and Q&A, combining OCR (Textract, Tesseract), BERT fine-tuned on SQuAD2.0, and semantic search via Pinecone and MongoDB. Deployed with FastAPI and AWS Lambda, it enables scalable, real-time document understanding.
